Public Distribution System

Introductory notes

  • Annual data on procurement, offtake and stocks of foodgrains are provided by the Ministry of Food, Consumer Affairs and Public Distribution, Government of India.
  • Data on procurement and offtake are only for rice and wheat. Data on total stocks also include coarse cereals.

Trends in Procurement, Offtake and Stocks of Rice and Wheat

Figure 1: Procurement, offtake and stocks of rice and wheat, India, in million tonnes
